Name: 风暴行动
About the game: It's a boring first person zombie game with no story Please don't expect too much from this game, this is just a game I made for tutorials, no gameplay, just fun. Game Mode: Burst mode (will be updated in the future) The biochemical model Survival Mode (will be updated in the future) Although there are three modes, but all are single-player mode, currently not multiplayer online.
